description: This file defines the ApiSchemaService class which provides methods for interacting with API schemas via HTTP requests to a backend service. It includes methods for CRUD operations, validation, publishing, exporting, importing, cloning, and retrieving version history of API schemas.

classes.name: ApiSchemaService
classes.description: A service class providing methods to manage API schemas, including CRUD operations, validation, publishing, exporting, importing, cloning, and version retrieval.

methods.name: getApiSchemas
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of API schemas with optional search filtering.

methods.name: getApiSchema
methods.description: Retrieves a specific API schema by its ID.

methods.name: createApiSchema
methods.description: Creates a new API schema with provided schema data.

methods.name: updateApiSchema
methods.description: Updates an existing API schema identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: deleteApiSchema
methods.description: Deletes an API schema by its ID.

methods.name: validateApiSchema
methods.description: Validates the API schema identified by ID.

methods.name: publishApiSchema
methods.description: Publishes the API schema identified by ID.

methods.name: unpublishApiSchema
methods.description: Unpublishes the API schema identified by ID.

methods.name: generateOpenApiSpec
methods.description: Generates the OpenAPI specification for the schema identified by ID.

methods.name: exportApiSchema
methods.description: Exports the API schema in specified format (JSON, YAML, OpenAPI).

methods.name: importApiSchema
methods.description: Imports an API schema from a provided file.

methods.name: cloneApiSchema
methods.description: Clones an existing API schema under a new name.

methods.name: getApiSchemaVersions
methods.description: Retrieves the version history of an API schema.
